sent.orig: Although Arabic, although the number is numbers are still low.
sent.trans: 但是，这篇报道也说到，最近几年，教授外语的公立中小学数量锐减。

sent.orig: Although we know that impermanence lawsubstantial factor, humans are also mainly accountable for a continued destructions.
sent.trans: 虽然我们了解无常的因素，但人类对地球的破坏应当负起主要的责任。

sent.orig: Mr. Lin was drenched with perspiration, and although he was worn out, he was very happy.
sent.trans: 林先生早已汗透棉袍。虽然是累得那么着，林先生心里却很愉快。

sent.orig: Although I rarely feel I need to a wetsuit for warmth.
sent.trans: 然而我很少感到自己需要湿式保暖衣来保暖。

sent.orig: It is what we might call craft, although it meant more than simple handiwork.
sent.trans: 我们可以称之为手工艺，尽管其含义远远大于简单的手工劳动。
